title: Campus Cleanliness Initiative
description: Encourage students and staff to maintain campus cleanliness by providing more waste bins and conducting awareness drives.

title: Monthly Town Hall Meetings
description: Organize monthly town hall meetings to allow students to voice concerns and suggest improvements.

title: Healthy Meal Options in Cafeteria
description: Introduce more healthy and affordable meal options in the campus cafeteria.

title: Extended Cafeteria Hours
description: Keep the cafeteria open until 10 PM to accommodate students studying late..

title: 24/7 Library Access
description: Provide students with 24/7 access to the library during exam weeks.

title: Increased Study Rooms
description: Add more private study rooms in the library to accommodate group studies and research.

title: Weekly Guided Meditation Sessions
description: Offer free guided meditation sessions every week for stress management.

title: Quiet Zones on Campus
description: Designate certain areas on campus as quiet zones for meditation and relaxation.

title: Academic Peer Support Program
description: Establish a peer support program where students can help each other with coursework.

title: Visa Assistance Helpline
description: Create a dedicated helpline to assist international students with visa-related issues.
